model

Class BasicEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.db.ebean.Model
      • model.BasicEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.avaje.ebean.bean.EntityBean, java.io.Serializable

    @Entity
public class BasicEvent
extends play.db.ebean.Model
    This class provides basic events that can directly be deducted from the sensors' raw data. It can be used as "bricks" in more sophisticated Events (see Event class definition). Note that it is persistent. Created by Mathieu on 31/01/2015.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • create

        public static BasicEvent create(BasicEvent basicEvent,
                                java.lang.String timeInterval,
                                java.lang.String detectionMethod,
                                java.lang.String sensor)
        Creates a new BasicEvent and saves it in the database.
        Parameters:
        basicEvent - the BasicEvent that must be initialized.
        timeInterval - the TimeInterval that must be set.
        detectionMethod - the method of detection of the event.
        sensor - the identifier of the sensor used.
        Returns:
        the BasicEvent given updated and saved.
